1Base #permalink

all base styles

1.1article #permalink

NOTHING SPECIFIED

1.2body #permalink

modifies body styles as follows:

  • sets position as relative (for cascading element placement)
  • sets margins to auto on left and right sides
  • invokes variable: $width-body on width
  • invokes variable: $height-body on min-height

1.3bootstrap-overrides #permalink

Does the following:

  • removes body background set for bootstrap -> body {background: none;}

1.4footer #permalink

modifies:

  • aligns all text center
  • clears both sides
  • sets font-size to 1em on footer (root)
  • sets overflow to auto -> allowing for floats (hacky)
  • removes margins from p
  • removes margin and padding from ul
  • removes list style types from ul li

1.5header #permalink

  • sets header width to $width-displays
  • sets position to relative -> allowing for positioning of child el
  • sets margin to $margin-header
  • sets overflow to auto -> allowing for floats (hacky)

1.6html #permalink

  • sets width to $width-html
  • sets height to $height-html
  • sets font-size to 1em (root of document)
  • REMOVED: centering margins

1.7main #permalink

  • sets width to 100% of parent container
  • sets padding to 0
  • clear: both
  • sets L-R margins at 0.5em

1.8nav #permalink

  • z-index: 100
  • removes li list-style-type
  • removes hover underline from links
  • sets margins to 0 for h1, h2 -

1.9section #permalink

NOTHING SPECIFIED
